website_summaries.verdict: The Z2 Play is a unique unlocked phone that combines solid performance with a modular design that taps into Motorola's Moto Mods add-ons.
pros: Current software and virtually no bloatware
Compatible with all major US carriers
cons: Difficult to use with one hand

customer_reviews.title: This is not a dual SIM phone
customer_reviews.text: I received this phone from merchant Breed, the title of the product listing said Dual SIM - it is NOT a dual SIM phone. One of the SIM slots has a plastic insert in it to prevent the insertion of a SIM. Even when this is removed and a SIM inserted it does not function. Neither the merchant nor Amazon has attempted to resolve this issue. I had to pay for shipping when the return wasn't possible because the phone has a security feature the prevents a reset. Bad all the way around on this one.
customer_reviews.author: jeezam

customer_reviews.title: not relieable
customer_reviews.text: Phone only lasted 4 months. Like the phone as far as close to bare bones android OS, battery life and Moto mods. But the phone screen went black after 4 month of use. The phone still rang and vibrated. I had the original Moto Z play and after about a year same issue. Attempted a repair on the Moto Z2 Play but screen replacement is not as easy as it should be and now the phone is completely worthless. If it was not for this I would recommend the phone.
customer_reviews.author: TheMadBater

customer_reviews.title: It's a deal... You're getting what you paid for though.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like the basic software is in Spanish and you can't change it. It's not really an issue as you only see it in the patch notes whenever you upgrade, but if you're someone like me, it's slightly annoying. Overall, it's a worse phone than my previous one which was the Moto z play original. Wish I never dropped it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Ozimek

customer_reviews.title: Not Registered!
customer_reviews.text: I received this phone, purchased a SIM card immediately, and was told that upon trying to activate it, that the device isn't registered. I will now need to wait 24 to 48 hours for Verizon to do whatever it is they need to do in order to jump through the hoops of getting this device registered so it can then be activated. Beyond frustrating:
customer_reviews.author: Kim D Paris

customer_reviews.title: Reliable moderately priced cell with great camera
customer_reviews.text: Good all round moderately priced cell phone. Bought it because of the extra battery that attaches directly to the back of the phone. Does help to have the extra battery available. Also like the quality of the camera.
customer_reviews.author: DJ McGinnis

customer_reviews.title: Both sim card readers are defective
customer_reviews.text: The phone works fine except in the most important way: both sim card readers are defective. Both fail to recognize functional sim cards. I requested a refund from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Ya don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy the unlocked for this price. It only works with T-Mobile which their service sucks. I called us cellular, at&t, Verizon and none of them support the unlocked version. Your better off buying the cheaper Verizon locked phone for 100 bucks less
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Spanish instructions?
customer_reviews.text: Good phone BUT have serious issues with speaker. the volume self adjusts and the instructions are in ALL Spanish
customer_reviews.author: Jefferson Golemon

customer_reviews.title: 50/50 It might work when you get it
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2, one for me and one for my wife. The first one worked just fine and was up and running within 10 minutes. The second one however was account locked and couldn't be factory reset. Had to use developer tools and software to bypass the account lock so i could reset it and use it. They must have forgotten to do this before they shipped it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Simply Awasome
customer_reviews.text: For my line of work I use a lot of cellphones... and this particular model of motorola it's awesome, great performance, the best main and additional battery... it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Carlo

customer_reviews.title: Great value and it's brand new with battery mod
customer_reviews.text: This is a brand new in a sealed Motorola box. This is our Moto Z phone because of the battery mod can get you through all day. When you get home around 6 or 7pm you internal battery is still at 80% The 8.0 OS is good and no bloatware The metal edging is classy high end.
customer_reviews.author: lgonza

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I brought this phone for boost, but was prepared to switch services if I needed to. I ended up having to but it's cool. Other than that I love the phone. Was well researched about the phone, the battery pack was precharged. I can't keep my hands off this phone. I'm looking for the mods now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Works great super fast and I can go for two days with regular use playing game, browsing the net, and social media with the battery mod.
customer_reviews.author: monk

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life and quality, not great picture quality.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great phone and has done everything I need it to do, the picture quality isn't as great as I had hoped. The battery life, however, is amazing. With the battery pack on the back, I can go 2-3 days without having to charge it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great device!
customer_reviews.text: Great device. I use it in the US and Europe. Dual Sim makes of this phone a very useful device for those who travel abroad. It is very light. Camera bump is slightly annoying, but with Moto Folio Mod camera doesn't protrude. Battery life is excellent, and power pack mod makes it last for two days. Elegant and minimalist design. Phone is fast and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: International phone
customer_reviews.text: This is an international phone will not work with all networks. Very frustrated was not label in main title
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: This phone is great I upgraded from the original Moto z. The battery life with the extra battery is amazing it will last about 2 days if bolth are on full charge. I also like all the moto mod options. If you are looking for a cheap phone that works great this is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Gasal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and delivered on schedule
customer_reviews.text: Everything turned out as planned. Product as advertised. Excellent quality and delivered on schedule. Two-Thumbs-Up!! Outstanding performance for a reasonable price. Value for money: WIN/WIN
customer_reviews.author: Juan STARCENBAUM

customer_reviews.title: Processing is horrible
customer_reviews.text: Processing / ram is completely inadaquete. Crashes very easily, 5-6 times a day, freezes often, can I get my money back?
customer_reviews.author: Sedwards

customer_reviews.title: really good phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love the moto-mods. This one comes with a place to snap a projector on. Everyone thinks it's the greatest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only came with European charger
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My phone came with a European charger though which was disappointing. The price is good for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Battery life
customer_reviews.text: At first, the battery life goes by very slow, and now it dies super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Danilda Toribio

customer_reviews.title: Strong midtier phone
customer_reviews.text: The metal build is strong and feels great. With the battery mod, the phone can go a very long time without a charge (5250 mAh total).
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: I will buy a new one when I get the money
customer_reviews.text: Do not leave it in your back pocket while you're riding a skateboard
customer_reviews.author: Adam w.

customer_reviews.title: At this point I don't think this is a very dependable phone
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately something in this particular device was corrupted rather quickly because I owned it less than 2 months and the battery says it's charged but will not hold a charge and there is no sound
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe this was under $200
customer_reviews.text: The phone is brand new, not refurbished or used and the price is perfect. Everything arrived on time in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: spruggie

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: We have been very happy with increased battery performance, screen & picture quality
customer_reviews.author: Matt G

customer_reviews.title: Defective SIM reader
customer_reviews.text: My phone had a defective SIM card reader, rendering it useless as a phone. I took it to a Verizon and T-Mobile outlet to try and fix the problem, just to have my concerns validated.
customer_reviews.author: Katie S.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my with my phone , great price, fast delivery, awesome thank you so much!!!!
customer_reviews.author: IzzyAmazon

customer_reviews.title: At 219 USD it'd a very good deal
customer_reviews.text: premium build, battery mod included and near pure android experience
customer_reviews.author: oswaldo lopez

customer_reviews.title: Value phone
customer_reviews.text: Very good phone for $220 just don't like the lack of Android pie. It's coming just not here yet
customer_reviews.author: Jecoliah  Farmer

customer_reviews.title: A good phone
customer_reviews.text: Battery lasts usually 4-8 hours depending on use. Comes with an extwrnal battery that can prolong its life for about 3 hours. With a screen protector and a case its survive multiple falls.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Screen problem
customer_reviews.text: I got that phone since March and already have an issue with the screen !! Even thoe I have that phone I otter box case and o never drop that phone and still having problems to unlock the screen!!
customer_reviews.author: Arkadiusz

customer_reviews.title: not dual card, misleading buyers
customer_reviews.text: On Amazon.com, Motorola Moto Z2 Play XT1710-06 (64GB) Dual SIM GSM Factory Unlocked US & Global 4G LTE Bands-Dark Gray, labeled Dual SIM GSM on Amazon, but not dual card, misleading buyers. I believe the title, but false. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kangyunbiao

customer_reviews.title: Works well in Nigeria. The recipients did not have to do anything to put it use.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it as a gift for family members in Nigeria. It works well for them. Both owners are small business women trading local foods and condiments. It works well for them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Uduk

customer_reviews.title: Great product - to be used for individual with autism
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use, product works well for my son. Locked down for his safety with Qustodio - which works as needed.
customer_reviews.author: David Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Works at Mexico,
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, works at Mexico, send it for Christmas’s present !
customer_reviews.author: gregoria Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing battery life!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new phone. I like the idea of the mods and it works fast and easy. The phone itself has a lasting battery, still at 60% at the end of the day. The only downside is that the charger is different than all my others. Overall, I'm loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone.
customer_reviews.text: I love my Moto Z2 Play. I've dropped it a half dozen times and there's not even a scratch on it. I did buy a screen protector and a wallet for it for protection but it is an awesome phone
customer_reviews.author: P Just

customer_reviews.title: Best Moto Z Phone.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product for the price but don't get fooled it's not dual SIM. The phone is fast and has excellent battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Calls to voicemail
customer_reviews.text: Calls were directly directed to voice mail without "do not disturb" mode on. Bought another phone and it happened again.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Paz

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Since it was an Asian phone it was using extended towers so it was slow and not able to get great reception and speed. Also never got my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Don't invest. Not worth the breakdown
customer_reviews.text: At first I was excited but only having it for a couple months. I'm so sick of it. Stupid thing turns off randomly. I would be using Spotify or Snapchat and Midway through the phone "dies" and turns off. Battery life sucks. Its all of sudden at 100% then down to 60% in just 3 minutes of use. Then everytime you restart it, the percentage goes down and down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken USB type c charging port
customer_reviews.text: Charging port is broken and not charging, and I mean the port on the phone not the wire.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product, no headphone included but everything was OK. Supplier and delivering was great.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Sandrone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing love it happy to keep buying here in amazon never going to stop
customer_reviews.author: elvis

customer_reviews.title: This phone does not work with AT&T internet. Talk ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone does not work with AT&T internet. Talk, text and wifi works, but AT&T internet will not connect. Please verify before placing order.
customer_reviews.author: VIVEK THOMAS

customer_reviews.title: Disaster
customer_reviews.text: They send my phone with diferent cab charge also after 45 days phone is not work. No support ... i fell like i lose my money.
customer_reviews.author: Tiago Dias Sotero

customer_reviews.title: Great phone and battery for the price
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from the original z play, even though the battery is a bit smaller it all lasts almost 2 days. Quick phone with enough ram and onboard storage never a hiccup despite it being a 6 series snapdragon. The front camera is fantastic and even with a real front flash! People are impressed how good it looks compared with a real flash compared to my wife's S7 and it's screen flash. Thin and light phone with moto mods make it a worth while experience. My last phones were a mate 9 and V10 and I don't miss flagships at all (except the new trend of phones with a high screen to body ratio)
customer_reviews.author: Mojo Star

customer_reviews.title: Dual SIM in offer, but single SIM phone delivered
customer_reviews.text: The offer was for a dual SIM phone, but a single phone SIM was delivered - 2nd slot blocked in the tray and no 2nd SIM option in the settings. The previous Moto Z2 Play started randomly rebooting after 14 months or so. Since rebooting continued after removing SD card and unistallation of most user apps, the rebooting could be firmly attributed to the hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Pawel Danielewicz

customer_reviews.title: Great cell phone
customer_reviews.text: I have no dislikes the phone works perfectly the way I wanted it to I'm replacing my old phone for this one z play phone by the way if anybody wants to know it works with Rodger wireless in Burlington Ontario Canada no problem
customer_reviews.author: david nuell

customer_reviews.title: didnt work
customer_reviews.text: nice looking phone in great shape one problem all it wanted to do is update first in English then in Spanish,wouldnt recognize sim card either support from amazon was ok,returned for a different phone
customer_reviews.author: mcgyver

customer_reviews.title: Love the phone
customer_reviews.text: Really love this phone! It has a long battery life with an awesome turbo charger that takes such little time to charge it fully. Easy to navigate, good volume, and vivid colors. Seller was great and packed it very well. Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: theresa

customer_reviews.title: Good option and good phone
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love (and it's not Friday) good option for a good phone and the modular options are amazing, of course you'll need to spend on those, but will be worth
customer_reviews.author: Wmaike

customer_reviews.title: The Dual SIM doesn't work. Its a sham.
customer_reviews.text: Even though the phone is displayed as a Dual SIM on the AMAZON, the second SIM doesn't work at all. This was the main reason I bought the phone but got hugely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sujith

customer_reviews.title: Arrived without Battery Pack
customer_reviews.text: Battery Pack box was empty. Will not replace, only return, refund. Now must wait for, God knows how long, for refund before ordering new phone. TWO WEEKS WITHOUT PHONE.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M. Coyne

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this phone. Them gave it as a gift. It had a lot of downloads or updates going on... But the colors are bright & the accessories that came with & after market are very nice indeed. The dual SIM was handy!
customer_reviews.author: TDWM

customer_reviews.title: My best phone so far
customer_reviews.text: I primarily bought this because it's very thin. But in terms of functionality it has nothing short of a high-end phone with twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Phone didn't come charged. Only bad thing so far.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my daily phone so far works well. Fast can't wait to try some mods, hopefully the camera work better than normal phone cameras.
customer_reviews.author: dog

customer_reviews.title: Bug that makes it worthless.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY, there is a bug that kills it randomly and Motorola and Lenovo won't help.
customer_reviews.author: C. NC

customer_reviews.title: Defective Phone Overheats After one Week of Use
customer_reviews.text: This phone is absolutely busted! It worked fine for 10 days, and then one morning the screen began glitching while I was watching a youtube video. The screen turned white and the phone continued overheating and vibrating at random for about two hours before the battery finally died. It got so hot I couldn't even touch it or it would burn my fingers! When I tried to plug it in, it immediately began overheating again and the screen stayed white and glitchy. I don't know if it's the phone model or the seller but these phones are DEFECTIVE.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: May work in US, but not from here and neither are its updates!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about the phone itself, but NOWHERE in this does it say this phone is from outside of the US. It would be one thing if it was just the instructions in spanish (which they were) but the firmware updates DO NOT pull from the US and are completely in spanish as well. This needs to be stated upfront for selling phones on Amazons US website.
customer_reviews.author: angus1357

product_meta.title: Motorola Moto Z2 Play (XT1710-09) 64GB Gold, 4GB RAM, Dual SIM, GSM Unlocked International Version, No Warranty
product_meta.description: Color:GoldThe Motorola Moto Z2 Play Dual XT1710-10 is a good Android phone with 2.2Ghz Octa-Core processor that allows run games and heavy applications. An advantage of the Motorola Moto Z2 Play Dual XT1710-10 is the possibility of using two mobile carriers, a Dual-SIM device with two SIM card slots. Great connectivity of this device includes Bluetooth 4.2 version with A2DP, WiFi 802.11 a/b/g/n + MIMO and NFC to make payments and allows connection to other devices. Including the battery, the Motorola Moto Z2 Play Dual XT1710-10 phone has 145 grams and it's a very thin device
feature_bullets: 12MP primary camera and 5MP front facing camera, 13.97 centimeters (5.5") Full HD AMOLED capacitive touchscreen, Android v7.0 Nougat operating system with 2.2GHz Qualcomm SnapdragonTM 626 processor octa core processor.
Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers such as AT&T and T-Mobile, but are not compatible with CDMA carriers such as Verizon and Sprint.

Please check if your GSM cellular carrier supports the bands for this model before purchasing, LTE may not be available in all areas: 2G bands GSM 900 / 1800 / 1900 - SIM 1 & SIM 2, 3G bands: HSDPA 800 /850 / 900 / 1900 / 2100, LTE: 2100/1800/850/2600/900/800/2600/2300/2500.
This device may not include a US warranty as some manufacturers do not honor warranties for international items. Please contact the seller for specific warranty information.
Box contains: phone, USB cable, charger (may be foreign), user guide. Water repellent nano-coating

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars187 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
